name: Cave Troll Ambush
description: A massive cave troll has been hunting in the area and uses the shadowed cavern as its lair. It has detected intruders and prepares to ambush them just inside the entrance.

creatures.name: Aric
creatures.notes: The player character entering the cave

creatures.name: Cave Troll
creatures.notes: Hidden in a dark recess, waiting to ambush

hazards.effect: DC 12 Dexterity save or fall prone when moving more than 20 feet in a turn

objectives.secondary: Avoid triggering cave-in (loud noises might loosen rocks from ceiling)

treasure.description: Partially digested adventurer's pack with rusty short sword

notes: The troll prefers to throw rocks at first to catch intruders off-guard, then charge in for melee attacks. It will target whoever carries light sources first. The troll fears fire and will retreat if reduced below 20 hit points.
